full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### High Performance Software Defined Radio Equipment

**Procurement Reference:** PW-22-01009978
**Solicitation Number:** W6369-22-X036
**Publication Date:** October 13, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** October 27, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date:** October 26, 2022

#### Project Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to supply and deliver high performance software defined radio equipment for research and development purposes.

**Requirements:**

* Two (2) high performance software defined radios for lab-based development and experimentation of RF waveforms.
* Compliance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement.
* Security requirements do not apply to this procurement.
* Bidders must refer to the Request for Proposal (RFP) for detailed requirements.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The respondent will be evaluated based on the compliant bid that offers the lowest-cost proposal. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Contract Award

DND intends to award a single contract for this requirement. Bidders must be aware that the Crown may decide not to award a contract, regardless of proposals received.

#### Documents and Attachments

Documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website.

* [Request for Proposal (RFP) in English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/13/219fcd63d696023209a1312eb42afd46/w6369-22-x036_-_rfp_en.pdf)
* [Request for Proposal (RFP) in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/13/69020da1b72bc37de9fd962ed5c77724/w6369-22-x036_-_rfp_fr.pdf)
* [Amendment 1 to the RFP in English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/26/b622b6d5e8e2d597b23d2a9ac6de0929/w6369-22-x036_-_rfp_amdendment_01_en.pdf)
* [Amendment 1 to the RFP in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/
